title: Keir Starmer must lead ‘moment of change’ after Labour turmoil, says Ed Miliband
summary_full: Minister calls for party’s briefing wars to end as MPs rally around ‘liberated’ prime minister after speech in parliamentEd Miliband has said Keir Starmer must lead a “moment of change” for the government, saying Labour needs to end the briefing wars against its own members and show “a greater clarity of purpose”.After a day of turmoil where the Scottish Labour leader, Anas Sarwar, called for Starmer to resign, Labour MPs rallied around the prime minister following a speech in parliament. Continue reading...
